name: Wuthering Waves: Thaw of Eons
storyline: Your forgotten past, hazy memories, and a strange dream... So many questions linger about your identity, and who you used to be. Meanwhile, a mysterious pull guides you to a hidden place on the distant sea...
summary:
Version 1.1 of Wuthering Waves, which included:
• New characters: Jinhsi and Changli
• New location: Mt. Firmament
• New companion story for Changli (Immortal Blaze)
• New echoes, events and more!
